content: think slow mornings and sunny afternoons the clover bloom blanket is made for moments like these whether draped over the sofa ready for snuggles or spread out on the lawn for a picnic it adds warmth colour and comfort to your everyday designed by emma leith known for her vibrant crochet creations for the home this joyful blanket is made using our recycled wool blend yarn scheepjes terrazzo the soft tweed effect with its attractive flecks brings beautiful depth and texture with a mix of join-as-you-go square motifs and changing colours there s always something new to enjoy as the blanket grows at its heart are multi-coloured four-leaf clover squares in case you need a little extra luck you ll also create flower squares and mini granny squares with each section framed by a border measuring 111 x 111cm 43 ¾ x 43 ¾ in the clover bloom blanket is a bright and happy make perfect for bringing a little sunshine into your home whatever the weather **the full written pattern is available as a free download in english uk crochet terminology with us conversion it includes illustrated charts and a layout schematic to guide you through each stage ** **materials** scheepjes terrazzo 70% recycled mulesing free wool 30% recycled viscose 50g/175m * yarn a 745 pergamena x 3 balls * yarn b 743 ardesia x 1 ball * yarn c 741 cenere x 2 balls * yarn d 721 lampone x 1 ball 1 x scheepjes terrazzo colour pack 70% recycled mulesing free wool 30% recycled viscose 60 x 10g/35m 4mm crochet hook
